Talk_0008: So anyone who would mistreat a banana...
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>Kehehehe... The noble swordsman,
scrounging for scraps?
Talk_0041:
<snd:Painful>Hey, stop that! Don't you recognize an
ally in disguise?!
Talk_0013:
Looks like it was worth using my spare
bananas as bait!
Talk_0042:
<snd:Painful>Ouch! What're you doing?! That's the first
time I've ever been attacked by an ally...
Talk_0014: You fell for the oldest trick in the book!
Talk_0043:
<snd:Painful>Hey... You KNEW this was a disguise
and attacked anyway!
Talk_0044:
<snd:Angry>What'll we do if Link sees us? Get out
of here—now!
Talk_0045:
<snd:Angry>More importantly, don't stand around
in full uniform! You'll tip Link off!
Talk_0017: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Unconscious>Urgh... Saw through my trap, did you?
Talk_0046:
<snd:Angry>If I catch you at the Gerudo hideout, I'll
give you a taste of your own medicine!
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Unconscious>Why you... How dare you do that to
my bananas?!
Talk_0050:
You stumbled into our secret storehouse
for treasures from the Depths. And now
that you've seen it, I can't let you live.
Talk_0021:
Harming a tree? Does your evil know no
bounds?!
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>Second rule of the Yiga Clan! Those who
steal bananas deserve death!
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>Third rule of the Yiga Clan! Those who
have wronged Master Kohga or bananas
deserve death!
Talk_0029:
Our disguises were perfect, but you...
You really are a threat to the Yiga Clan!
Talk_0030:
It doesn't matter that you saw through
our disguises. We have you now!
Talk_0002:
Did you really think someone would leave
such premier bananas just lying around?
Talk_0004: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Unconscious>Urgh... So you knew it was a trap.
Talk_0033:
<snd:SurpriseS>Hey, don't get so close to those in
uniform! Link will realize it's a trap!
Talk_0034:
<snd:SurpriseS>Hey! Those are trap bananas! They're
there to catch our enemies, not our allies!
Talk_0002_01:
The forests of Faron are famous for their
bananas...<sp:5:1:0>which makes them the perfect
place<sp:5:0:0> to set a trap!
Talk_0035:
<snd:SurpriseS>Hey! Those are bait for Link! I know they
look delicious, but don't get taken in!
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>First rule of the Yiga Clan! Those who
disrespect Master Kohga or bananas
deserve death!
